[Dark Wizard Class Transfer]:
In order to become a Spellhowler the player must successfully complete three quests. The Trial of the Scholar may be undertaken by a player of level 35 or above. This quest begins by meeting with Magister Mirien of the Town of Dion. The Testimony of Fate may be undertaken by a player of level 37 or above. This quest begins by meeting with Magister Kaira of the Town of Giran. Finally, the Test of Magus may be undertaken by a player of level 39 or above. This quest begins by meeting with Bard Rukal of the Town of Dion.
